Text:
Just a note that there may be some pages out of order on this one.  Was just reviewing the files and noticed an issue with how pages 1 - 9 were sorted.  If you have this file and encounter this problem...
(1) change the "cbz" extension to "zip"
(2) extract the individual images
(3) relabel pages "(1) - (9)" to "(01) - (09)"
(4) re-compress the individual images to a "zip" file
(5) change the "zip" extension to "cbz"

Really sorry about this; I was still getting the hang of making these.
